descriptionHtml:

• Top-up your account using your Debit/Credit Card or PayMaya **powered by GigaPay!**
• Discover and register new passions with GIGA promos for more Video, more Stories, more Games! Get to B**uild Your Own GIGA too!**
• Monitor & **check your Inbox** to review your subscriptions, inclusions and your usage .
• Link and manage multiple accounts with ease! You can also unlink and delete accounts now.

**Postpaid features on the GigaLife App:**

• Easily review the billing history of your account.
• Conveniently pay your bill using Debit/Credit Card, PayMaya and even GigaPoints!
• Always be on top of your data usage with the real time data tracker.
• Link and manage multiple accounts with ease! You can also unlink and delete accounts now.

**Earn MORE GigaPoints to redeem MORE on the GigaLife App!**

• Easily monitor & earn GigaPoints points for transactions you do on the app! It’s that simple!
• Redeem your points on the app. Keep an eye out for the exciting items you can redeem only on the GigaLife App!
• Monthly GigaDays happen every 19th-22nd of the month. Get 50% off Giga Promos and 66% off UNLIDATA!

The GigaLife App is FREE to use when you are on the Philippines' fastest LTE network. This is available for all Smart and TNT subscribers and you can delete any previous version of the TNT or MySmart App you may have installed in the past.

GigaMania is leaving GigaLife. But we have new features releasing!

Postpaid subscribers now get increased rewards when paying your bill on-time and in full to get 5% points cashback

Emergency Load Assistance (ELA) is now in GigaLife! Stay connected with family and friends during times of calamity or emergency!

Lifeline is now available for our Postpaid subs and has improved security! Confirm your transactions with OTP!

Plus bug fixes for improved stability and performance!

title: GigaLife

container.value: Smart Tower, 6799 Ayala Avenue, Makati City, Philippines

creator: Smart  Communications, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
This is the GigaLife App! Your gateway to the GigaLife. Discover and enjoy your passions all in one tap!

The GigaLife App is now available for the following brands: Smart Prepaid, Smart Bro Prepaid, TNT, Smart Postpaid, Smart Bro Postpaid, Smart Signature and now for PLDT Prepaid Home WiFi.

Prepaid features on the GigaLife App:

• Top-up your account using your Debit/Credit Card or PayMaya powered by GigaPay!
• Discover and register new passions with GIGA promos for more Video, more Stories, more Games! Get to Build Your Own GIGA too!
• Monitor & check your Inbox to review your subscriptions, inclusions and your usage.
• Link and manage multiple accounts with ease! You can also unlink and delete accounts now.

Postpaid features on the GigaLife App:

• Easily review the billing history of your account.
• Conveniently pay your bill using Debit/Credit Card, PayMaya and even GigaPoints!
• Always be on top of your data usage with the real time data tracker.
• Link and manage multiple accounts with ease! You can also unlink and delete accounts now.

Earn MORE GigaPoints to redeem MORE on the GigaLife App!

• Easily monitor & earn GigaPoints points for transactions you do on the app! It’s that simple!
• Redeem your points on the app. Keep an eye out for the exciting items you can redeem only on the GigaLife App!
• Monthly GigaDays happen every 19th-22nd of the month. Get 50% off Giga Promos and 66% off UNLIDATA!

Buying Load and Promos are now made easier with GigaPay:

• Link a PayMaya e-wallet or your credit/debit cards to activate GigaPay within the GigaLife App.
• GigaPay makes buying promos and topping up your load simpler and more convenient without having to leave the app, with a quick swipe-to-pay!
• Link up to 5 fund sources to GigaPay, and earn GigaPoints for the first 2!
• Monitor every GigaPay transaction you make directly on the GigaLife App.

The GigaLife App is FREE to use when you are on the Philippines' fastest LTE network. This is available for all Smart and TNT subscribers and you can delete any previous version of the TNT or MySmart App you may have installed in the past.

In 2021, GigaLife Team continues to keep on improving GigaLife App. A lot of awesome features are coming your way as we continue to listen to your comments and suggestions.

Stay tuned for more updates!

Forgot password? No more. Introducing new ways to log in! Register your MPIN to
quickly enter the app or try your Fingerprint for a hassle-free experience!

SIM Registration deadline is on the 25th! UNREGISTERED SIMs will be
PERMANENTLY deactivated soon! Register them now and get ACCESS to
EXCLUSIVE LIMITED-TIME OFFERS and FREEBIES!

The next couple of updates are very exciting so stay tuned!

title: GigaLife

container.value: Smart Tower, 6799 Ayala Avenue, Makati City, Philippines

creator: Smart  Communications, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
This is the GigaLife App! Your gateway to the GigaLife. Discover and enjoy your passions all in one tap!

The GigaLife App is now available for the following brands: Smart Prepaid, Smart Bro Prepaid, TNT, Smart Postpaid, Smart Bro Postpaid, Smart Signature and now for PLDT Prepaid Home WiFi.

Prepaid features on the GigaLife App:

• Top-up your account using your Debit/Credit Card or PayMaya powered by GigaPay!
• Discover and register new passions with GIGA promos for more Video, more Stories, more Games! Get to Build Your Own GIGA too!
• Monitor & check your Inbox to review your subscriptions, inclusions and your usage.
• Link and manage multiple accounts with ease! You can also unlink and delete accounts now.

Postpaid features on the GigaLife App:

• Easily review the billing history of your account.
• Conveniently pay your bill using Debit/Credit Card, PayMaya and even GigaPoints!
• Always be on top of your data usage with the real time data tracker.
• Link and manage multiple accounts with ease! You can also unlink and delete accounts now.

Earn MORE GigaPoints to redeem MORE on the GigaLife App!

• Easily monitor & earn GigaPoints points for transactions you do on the app! It’s that simple!
• Redeem your points on the app. Keep an eye out for the exciting items you can redeem only on the GigaLife App!
• Monthly GigaDays happen every 19th-22nd of the month. Get 50% off Giga Promos and 66% off UNLIDATA!

Buying Load and Promos are now made easier with GigaPay:

• Link a PayMaya e-wallet or your credit/debit cards to activate GigaPay within the GigaLife App.
• GigaPay makes buying promos and topping up your load simpler and more convenient without having to leave the app, with a quick swipe-to-pay!
• Link up to 5 fund sources to GigaPay, and earn GigaPoints for the first 2!
• Monitor every GigaPay transaction you make directly on the GigaLife App.

The GigaLife App is FREE to use when you are on the Philippines' fastest LTE network. This is available for all Smart and TNT subscribers and you can delete any previous version of the TNT or MySmart App you may have installed in the past.

In 2021, GigaLife Team continues to keep on improving GigaLife App. A lot of awesome features are coming your way as we continue to listen to your comments and suggestions.

Stay tuned for more updates!
descriptionShort: The only app for Smart, Signature, Infinity, Bro, TNT & PLDT Prepaid Home WiFi.

title:

container.value: Smart Tower, 6799 Ayala Avenue, Makati City, Philippines

creator: Smart  Communications, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
This is the Smart App, formerly Gigalife! Your gateway to live more today! Discover and enjoy your passions all in one tap!

The Smart App is now available for the following brands: Smart Prepaid, Smart Bro Prepaid, TNT, Smart Postpaid, Smart Bro Postpaid, Smart Signature and now for PLDT Prepaid Home WiFi.

Prepaid features on the Smart app:
- Top-up your account using your Debit/Credit Card or PayMaya powered by GigaPay!
- Discover and register new promos for more Video, more Stories, more Games!
- Monitor & check your Inbox to review your subscriptions, inclusions and your usage.
- Link and manage multiple accounts with ease! You can also unlink and delete accounts now.

Postpaid features on the Smart app:
- Easily review the billing history of your account.
- Conveniently pay your bill using Debit/Credit Card, PayMaya and even GigaPoints!
- Always be on top of your data usage with the real time data tracker.
- Link and manage multiple accounts with ease! You can also unlink and delete accounts now.

Earn MORE GigaPoints to redeem MORE on the Smart app!
- Easily monitor & earn GigaPoints points for transactions you do on the app! It’s that simple!
- Redeem your points on the app. Keep an eye out for the exciting items you can redeem only on the GigaLife App!


Buying Load and Promos are now made easier with GigaPay:
- Link a PayMaya e-wallet or your credit/debit cards to activate GigaPay within the Smart app.
- GigaPay makes buying promos and topping up your load simpler and more convenient without having to leave the app, with a quick swipe-to-pay!
- Link up to 5 fund sources to GigaPay, and earn GigaPoints for the first 2!
- Monitor every GigaPay transaction you make directly on the Smart app.


The Smart app is FREE to use when you are on the Philippines' fastest LTE network. This is available for all Smart and TNT subscribers and you can delete any previous version of the TNT or MySmart App you may have installed in the past.


In 2023, The Smart App Team continues to keep on improving Smart. A lot of awesome features are coming your way as we continue to listen to your comments and suggestions.

Stay tuned for more updates!
descriptionShort: The only app for Smart, Signature, Infinity, Bro, TNT & PLDT Prepaid Home WiFi.

appDetails.developerAddress: Smart Tower, 6799 Ayala Avenue, Makati City, Philippines
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

Update the Smart App today!

The Smart App is now available for the following brands: Smart Prepaid, Smart Bro Prepaid, TNT, Smart Postpaid, Smart Bro Postpaid, Smart Signature and now for PLDT Prepaid Home WiFi.

Prepaid features on the Smart app:
- Top-up your account using your Debit/Credit Card or PayMaya powered by GigaPay!
- Discover and register new promos for more Video, more Stories, more Games!
- Monitor & check your Inbox to review your subscriptions, inclusions and your usage.
- Link and manage multiple accounts with ease! You can also unlink and delete accounts now.

Postpaid features on the Smart app:
- Easily review the billing history of your account.
- Conveniently pay your bill using Debit/Credit Card, PayMaya and even GigaPoints!
- Always be on top of your data usage with the real time data tracker.
- Link and manage multiple accounts with ease! You can also unlink and delete accounts now.

Earn MORE GigaPoints to redeem MORE on the Smart app!
- Easily monitor & earn GigaPoints points for transactions you do on the app! It’s that simple!
- Redeem your points on the app. Keep an eye out for the exciting items you can redeem only on the GigaLife App!


Buying Load and Promos are now made easier with GigaPay:
- Link a PayMaya e-wallet or your credit/debit cards to activate GigaPay within the Smart app.
- GigaPay makes buying promos and topping up your load simpler and more convenient without having to leave the app, with a quick swipe-to-pay!
- Link up to 5 fund sources to GigaPay, and earn GigaPoints for the first 2!
- Monitor every GigaPay transaction you make directly on the Smart app.


The Smart app is FREE to use when you are on the Philippines' fastest LTE network. This is available for all Smart and TNT subscribers and you can delete any previous version of the TNT or MySmart App you may have installed in the past.


In 2023, The Smart App Team continues to keep on improving Smart. A lot of awesome features are coming your way as we continue to listen to your comments and suggestions.

Stay tuned for more updates!
